Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Coulter Synchron CX Pro System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Chromogenic color change measured by spectrophotometer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SYNCHRON Systems Cholinesterase (CHEX) Reagent for measuring cholinesterase activity in serum and plasma on Beckman Coulter analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of Cholinesterase activity in human serum and plasma, used in diagnosis and treatment of cholinesterase inhibition disorders such as insecticide and succinylcholine poisoning.
